snippet: Southern California Exxon dealers won another victory Tuesday in their war to keep the oil giant from abandoning the region on terms they say will ruin them. Until a dealers' lawsuit against Exxon is settled, Federal District Judge Robert M. Takas...
lead_paragraph: Southern California Exxon dealers won another victory Tuesday in their war to keep the oil giant from abandoning the region on terms they say will ruin them. Until a dealers' lawsuit against Exxon is settled, Federal District Judge Robert M. Takasugi blocked the company from ending its credit card program, requiring local dealers to pay cash for gas, and removing equipment from their stations.

headline.main: EXXON LOSES A ROUND IN CALIFORNIA DEALERS' LAWSUIT
